summary: In July 1956, the five-member Barstow family of Wethersfield, Connecticut, won a free trip to newly-opened Disneyland in Anaheim, California, in a nationwide contest. This 30-minute amateur... See full summary Â»
cast: Daniel Barstow|David Barstow|Mary Barstow|Meg Barstow|Robbins Barstow|Steve Martin
title: Disneyland Dream
